name: Realm Soul: Reawakening Chapter 1 V1.01
description:
Join a classic RPG experience and see the first chapter of the great battle between Light and Darkness!

This is my first RPG maker project that plays from start to finish!

Please give me any constructive criticisms as I hope to continue to grow and learn how to use the program and become more experienced!

HOW TO PLAY:
Simply unzip the file, and double click the icon labelled "Game"
